game.name: FZ Steam Trucker
game.description:
This time you do not have any luxurious and sports car to drive! But, you are going to sit behind the wheel of this amazing steampunk big rig. Are you ready friends to become a part of the unique driving experience? Join FZ Steam Trucker and be prepared to help a truck to deliver its shipment to the end of the track! Make sure that your vehicle reaches the garage without spilling anything. No road rage, traffic jams or racecars to experience here!

You can drive your vehicle at a very low speed. Here is not a track where you can race your vehicle at 200 mph. However, the low speed track game is still full of plenty of obstacles to deal with. People had to drive on the uneven roads and tracks in the steam engine days. As a response, get ready to control numerous cracks and bumps when you take care of delivering the shipment from one place to another in this brand new adventure game.

You would definitely miss out the mayhem of a destructive game when plan to play this free online platform game. In each level, you face off unique and multiple difficulties that would keep you busy for hours. Get ready to challenge your driving and balance maintaining abilities to the maximum level to secure your place on the top! This chill truck leveler includes amazing graphics, easy gameplay, as well as color and design changing background.
